analysis.key_quote: This rule illegally strips federal employees of their appeal rights to the Merit Systems Protection Board (5 U.S.C. § § 7511-7515), runs afoul of 142 years of precedent, and as-applied, will allow agencies to falsely reclassify positions as policy-making.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its legal and constitutional violations, emphasizing the importance of merit-based systems and due process protections for federal employees, which are threatened by the rule's implementation.
